class.name: ch.algotrader.entity.trade.OrderImpl
class.meta: Base Class for all Order Types

property.name: intId
property.meta: The Internal Order Id. The Id is typically comprised of a {@code sessionQualifier}, a {@code rootId} and potentially a {@code version}. Example: ibn123.0

property.name: extId
property.meta: The External Order Id assigned by the external Broker

property.name: dateTime
property.meta: The dateTime the order was sent. This is set automatically by the {@link ch.algotrader.service.OrderService OrderService}

many-to-one.name: security
many-to-one.meta: The base class of all Securities in the system

many-to-one.name: account
many-to-one.meta: Represents an actual Account / AccountGroup / AllocationProfile with an external Broker / Bank

map.name: orderProperties
map.meta: Base Class for all Order Types

many-to-one.name: strategy
many-to-one.meta: Represents a running Strategy within the system. In addition the AlgoTrader Server is also represented by an instance of this class.
